column1: Uchi////There's always a long wait and the menu is extremely pricey! This place is Better for anniversary's
column2: birthdays or for any other occasional events because of the price. But hey when i went it was simply amazing i loved every dish.. some even made me tear up since it melts in your mouth like shit.. you're 100 dollars for 3 plates it better be good like got damn i wanted to cry Hahahaha but anyways go and treat yourself fancy.
